text: 63|4|(Napiye!) Avarkalai nir parttal, avarkalutaiya tekankal unkalai accariyappatuttum. Avarkal peca arampittal, avarkalutaiya varttaiyaiye ninkal ketkumpati erpatum. (Nir pecuvatarku vayppalikkatu pecuvarkal.) Cuvarril caynta marankalaippol avarkal (acaiyatu) irupparkal. (Avarkal ceviyurum) entac captattaiyum tankalukku virotamakap pecuvatakave ennik kolvarkal. (Napiye!) Ivarkaltan (umatu unmaiyana) etirikal. Akave, ivarkalaip parri nir eccarikkaiyaka iruntu kolviraka. Allah avarkalai alittuvituvan. (Cattiyattiliruntu) avarkal enku celkinranar
